subject: Re: [junit] Log4J Logging in JUnit

messageBody:
brains_reddy wrote:

> I was trying to log message thru Log4J in the Junit test cases, but i
> am unable to print the logs out. At this moment i have a few things in
> mind such as
> 1. How to write logs in the test cases, if there is some sample code,
> please forward it.

JUnit test cases are just Java classes, so there should be no problem.
Simply configure logging as normal.

> 2.How to log the result of the assertions we perform in the test methods

You have to do this yourself. JUnit does not log anything, so you'd need
to reimplement a few methods on Assert in order to add logging to the
assertions.

> 3.How to write the logs to a text file or to a database report.any
> sample code if possible.

This is a Log4J question, rather than a JUnit question. Someone here
might be able to answer, but you'd have more luck on a Log4J mailing list.

_JUnit Recipes_, chapter 7, deals extensively with reporting results.
Scott Stirling did an excellent job with the chapter, so you can also
look there.

Take care.
